solution_line_template: It takes Tom {elizabeth_time_minutes}*{tom_multiplier} = <<{elizabeth_time_minutes}*{tom_multiplier}={tom_time_minutes}>>{tom_time_minutes} minutes to climb the hill.
It takes Tom {tom_time_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour} = <<{tom_time_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={tom_time_hours}>>{tom_time_hours} hours to climb the hill.
